subject: Tennis
French Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Slamming serves and covering court like few men on earth (or clay) can manage, Gael Monfils rolled past Bobby Reynolds, 6-2, 6-3, 6-1, in just one hour and 28 minutes.
snippet: Slamming serves and covering court like few men on earth (or clay) can manage, Gael Monfils rolled past Bobby Reynolds, 6-2, 6-3, 6-1, in just one hour and 28 minutes.
